titles.title: A bill for the relief of Da Ying Huang and Shao Lan Huang, husband and wife, and their child, Si Jing Huang.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/12/1987--Introduced. Declares three named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
